text: Galeodes blanchardi is a species of solifuges or sun spiders.Biolib ==Description== These spiders show long hairy appendages. Like other solifuges, they are mainly nocturnal. ==Distribution and habitat== This species can be found in arid areas in Algeria, Libya, Morocco, Togo and Tunisia. ==References== Category:Solifugae Category:Arachnids of Africa Category:Animals described in 1891
title: Galeodes blanchardi
